docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, June 13 Intelligent college students, "basically quite healthy psychologically" but confronted with an "identity crisis," were cited today as the largest body of users of LSD.

headline.main: LSD CONFERENCE OPENS ON COAST; Psychologist Divides Users Into Seven Categories

docs.abstract: Dr Kast repts 'short but profound impact' on dying patients of drug LSD, says it eases physical distress and lifts spirits
docs.snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, June 13  Intelligent college students, "basically quite healthy psychologically" but confronted with an "identity crisis," were cited today as the largest body of users of LSD.

byline.original: By LAWRENCE E. DAVIES Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: In 1960 and 1961 the signs of a medical catastrophe were appearing in many parts of the world, but they were too scattered to be obvious to any single observer. Thousands died and thousands of others were maimed while individual physicians groped for clues as to what was happening.

docs.lead_paragraph: IN the past 10 years there has been world-wide publicity for the Amer ican probes into space. Much less attention has so far been paid to another type of scientific exploration in which American researchers have made a breakthrough that may prove even more important to human health and happiness than the launching of astronauts the systematic study of the mysterious processes of sleep.
docs.abstract: D Foulkes book The Psychology of Sleep and Luce-Segal book Sleep revd

docs.lead_paragraph: Plans have virtually been completed for an International Drug Monitoring System designed to avert disasters like that in which thousands of deformed children were born of mothers taking thalidomide as a tranquilizer.

headline.main: WORLD WATCH SET ON DRUGS' EFFECTS; Plan Is to Avoid a Repeat of Thalidomide Cases

docs.abstract: WHO plans Internatl Drug Monitoring System to study drugs effects, seeking to avert bad effects and large scale disasters, conv, Washington (W Sullivan rept); FDA computers to be used; details
docs.snippet: Plans have virtually been completed for an International Drug Monitoring System designed to avert disasters like that in which thousands of deformed children were born of mothers taking thalidomide as a tranquilizer.
